ygData.subject: Re: Will Autobots help to MAximals????
ygData.msgSnippet: Pacifix rode up towards the Maximal base, the smoke pouring out of it made his fuel pump drop. Such needless destruction. He said to himself, surely not

Subject: Re: Will Autobots help to MAximals????

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Pacifix rode up towards the Maximal base, the smoke pouring out of it
made his fuel pump drop. "Such needless destruction." He said to
himself, surely not talking to Slag. 

As he neared he did give his attention to the Dinobot. "We are on a
rescue mission, understood Slag. We do not bring hostilities. We are
only going to help those in need of it."
